```{r setup}
library(polySimIBD)
```


```{r}
set.seed(1)
# define parameters

start <- Sys.time()
swf <- sim_structured_WF(pos = seq(1,1e3,1e2),
                         K = 1, 
                         m = 1,
                         rho = 1e-4, 
                         mean_coi = 5e2
                         )

ARG <- get_ARG(swf, nodes = c(1,3))
end <- Sys.time()
end-start


plot_coalescence_trees(ARG, loci = 1)


```
